# Tracker of the Society (Trait)
## Overview
**Tracker of the Society (Ranger, Pathfinder Society):** Thanks to your time as a Pathfinder, youâ€™ve mastered the art of tracking. You gain a +1 trait bonus on Initiative checks and a +2 trait bonus on [[Survival (Skill)|Survival]] skill checks made while traveling through any of your favored terrains. This is in addition to any bonuses you receive from your Favored Terrain class ability.

**Source:** Faction Guide, pg. 62
